TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SqlProfileProvider extends System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider

summary.span: 对 ASP.NET 应用程序的配置文件信息在 SQL Server 数据库中的存储进行管理。

span.span: Manages storage of profile information for an ASP.NET application in a SQL Server database.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 配置文件用于存储和检索数据源（如数据库）中的用户设置。The ASP.NET profile is used to store and retrieve user settings in a data source such as a database. 使用当前的属性访问用户配置文件 。The user profile is accessed using the property of the current . 配置文件信息和属性值使用配置文件提供程序进行管理。Profile information and property values are managed using a profile provider. ASP.NET 使用类来存储和检索使用 SQL Server 数据库的 ASP.NET 应用程序的配置文件设置。The class is used by ASP.NET to store and retrieve profile settings for an ASP.NET application that is using a SQL Server database. 若要使用 ，必须先创建所使用的 SQL Server 数据库 。To use a , you must first create the SQL Server database used by the . 若要创建使用的数据库 ，请运行在 [*drive*：] \WINDOWS\Microsoft.NET\Framework 文件夹中找到的 aspnet_regsql.exe 工具， \\ `2.0versionNumber` 并指定 **-A p**选项。To create the database used by the , run the aspnet_regsql.exe tool, which is found in the [*drive*:]\WINDOWS\Microsoft.NET\Framework\\`2.0versionNumber` folder, and specify the **-A p** option. 以下命令演示了如何使用 aspnet_regsql.exe 可执行文件：The following command demonstrates how you might use the aspnet_regsql.exe executable: ``` aspnet_regsql.exe -A p ``` 上面的示例未指定创建的数据库的名称，因此将使用默认名称。The example above does not specify a name for the database that is created, so the default name will be used. 默认数据库名称为 Aspnetdb.mdf。The default database name is Aspnetdb. 计算机配置包含一个 名为 AspNetSqlProvider 的默认实例，该实例连接到本地计算机上的 SQL Server。The machine configuration contains a default instance named AspNetSqlProvider that connects to the SQL Server on the local machine. 您可以使用此提供程序的实例，或在 ASP.NET 应用程序的 Web.config 文件中指定自己的实例。You can use this instance of the provider, or specify your own in the Web.config file for your ASP.NET application. > [!NOTE] > 如果配置文件提供程序使用集成安全性的连接字符串进行配置，则 ASP.NET 应用程序的进程帐户必须具有连接到 SQL Server 数据库的权限。If the profile provider is configured with a connection string that uses integrated security, the process account of the ASP.NET application must have rights to connect to the SQL Server database. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了配置为使用的 ASP.NET 应用程序的 Web.config 文件 。The following code example shows the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application configured to use a . ``` ```

related.span: ASP.NET 配置文件属性概述

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 调用 构造函数，以 使用应用程序的配置文件中指定的值创建类的实例。ASP.NET calls the constructor to create an instance of the class using the values specified in the configuration file for the application. 不应在代码中使用此构造函数。This constructor is not intended to be used from your code.

summary.span: 获取或设置要存储和检索其配置文件信息的应用程序的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the application for which to store and retrieve profile information.

value.span: 要存储和检索其配置文件信息的应用程序的名称。

span.span: The name of the application for which to store and retrieve profile information.
The default is the value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性将 配置文件信息与不同的应用程序相关联。The property is used by the to associate profile information with different applications. 这使多个应用程序能够使用同一个数据库来存储用户信息，而不会在重复用户之间发生冲突。This enables multiple applications to use the same database to store user information without running into conflicts between duplicate users. 多个 ASP.NET 应用程序可以通过在属性中指定相同的值，来使用相同的用户数据库 。Multiple ASP.NET applications can use the same user database by specifying the same value in the property. 可以通过编程方式设置该属性，也可以使用属性在 Web 应用程序的配置文件中以声明方式设置该属性 `applicationName` 。The property can be set programmatically, or it can be set declaratively in the configuration file for the Web application using the `applicationName` attribute. 如果没有为 `applicationName` Web 应用程序的配置文件中的属性指定值，则 该值将用于 ASP.NET 应用程序。If a value is not specified for the `applicationName` attribute in the configuration file for the Web application, then the value is used for ASP.NET applications. 对于 non-ASP.NET 应用程序，默认值为 没有文件扩展名的值。For non-ASP.NET applications, the default value is the value without the file extension. > [!CAUTION] > 由于单个默认配置文件提供程序实例用于某个对象提供的所有请求，因此 您可以同时执行多个请求并尝试设置该 属性值。Because a single default profile provider instance is used for all of the requests served by an object, you can have multiple requests executing concurrently and attempting to set the property value. 对于多个写入，属性不是线程安全的，并且更改 属性值可能会导致应用程序的多个用户产生意外行为。The property is not thread safe for multiple writes, and changing the property value can result in unexpected behavior for multiple users of an application. 建议你避免编写允许用户设置属性的代码， 除非你必须这样做。It is recommended that you avoid writing code that allows users to set the property unless you must. 可能需要设置属性的应用程序的一个示例 是管理多个应用程序的配置文件数据的管理应用程序。An example of an application where setting the property may be required is an administrative application that manages profile data for multiple applications. 此类应用程序应为单用户应用程序，而不是 Web 应用程序。Such an application should be a single-user application and not a Web application. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示 `system.web` ASP.NET 应用程序的 Web.config 文件部分中的元素。The following code example shows the element in the `system.web` section of the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application. 它指定应用程序的 实例，并将 属性值设置为 `MyApplication` 。It specifies the application's instance and sets the property value to `MyApplication`. ``` ```

exception.span: 不具有 ASP.NET 承载权限的调用方尝试设置 属性。

span.span: An attempt was made to set the property by a caller that does not have ASP.NET hosting permission.

exception.span: 尝试将 属性设置为长于 256 个字符的字符串。

span.span: An attempt was made to set the property to a string that is longer than 256 characters.

span.span: One of the values, specifying whether anonymous, authenticated, or both types of profiles are deleted.

param.span: 一个 ，确定将哪些用户配置文件视为处于不活动状态。

span.span: A that identifies which user profiles are considered inactive.

param.span: 如果用户配置文件的 与此日期和时间相同，或在此日期和时间之前，则此配置文件被视为处于不活动状态。

span.span: If the of a user profile occurs on or before this date and time, the profile is considered inactive.

summary.span: 删除上次活动日期出现在指定日期和时间之前的配置文件的用户配置文件数据。

span.span: Deletes user profile data for profiles in which the last activity date occurred before the specified date and time.

returns.span: 从数据源中删除的配置文件的数目。

span.span: The number of profiles deleted from the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用于从配置文件中的属性指定的应用程序的数据源中删除未使用的配置文件数据 `applicationName` 。The method is used to remove unused profile data from the data source for the application specified by the `applicationName` attribute in the configuration file. 使用 `authenticationOption` 参数来指定是只想要搜索匿名配置文件、仅限经过身份验证的配置文件还是要搜索的所有配置文件。Use the `authenticationOption` parameter to specify whether you want only anonymous profiles, only authenticated profiles, or all profiles to be searched. 在搜索的配置文件中，将 删除在指定参数值之前或之前出现的任何配置文件 `userInactiveSinceDate` 。Of the searched profiles, any profile with a that occurs on or before the specified `userInactiveSinceDate` parameter value is deleted. 在对方法的调用过程中执行的数据库更新在 事务中进行。The database updates that are performed during the call to the method are made within a transaction. 如果遇到错误，则回滚事务，并且不执行任何更新。If an error is encountered, the transaction is rolled back and no updates are performed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了管理不活动配置文件的 ASP.NET 页。The following code example shows an ASP.NET page that manages inactive profiles. 提供了一个按钮，用于删除自指定的日期以来未访问过的所有配置文件，以使配置文件处于非活动状态。A button is provided to delete all profiles that have not been accessed since the date specified for considering a profile to be inactive. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider/CS/DeleteInactiveProfilescs.aspx#4)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider/VB/DeleteInactiveProfilesvb.aspx#4)]

param.name: usernames
param.span: 要删除的配置文件的用户名字符串数组。

span.span: A string array of user names for profiles to be deleted.

summary.span: 从数据源中删除提供的一系列用户名的配置文件属性和信息。

span.span: Deletes profile properties and information from the data source for the supplied list of user names.

returns.span: 从数据源中删除的配置文件的数目。

span.span: The number of profiles deleted from the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法从 `applicationName` 配置文件中属性指定的应用程序的数据源中删除指定配置文件的所有配置文件信息和属性。The method deletes all profile information and properties for the specified profiles from the data source for the application specified by the `applicationName` attribute in the configuration file. 要删除的配置文件列表指定为用户名的字符串数组。The list of profiles to delete is specified as a string array of user names. 如果参数中的用户名的配置文件属性和信息在数据源中存在 `usernames` ，则会将其删除。If profile properties and information exist in the data source for a user name in the `usernames` parameter, they are deleted. 返回值可能不同于指定数组的长度 `usernames` 。The return value may differ from the length of the specified array of `usernames`. 这表明指定数组中的某些配置文件 `usernames` 已从数据存储中删除。This indicates that some of the profiles in the specified array of `usernames` were already deleted from the data store. 在对方法的调用过程中执行的数据库更新在 事务中进行。The database updates that are performed during the call to the method are made within a transaction. 如果遇到错误，则回滚事务，并且不执行任何更新。If an error is encountered, the transaction is rolled back and no updates are performed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了管理不活动配置文件的 ASP.NET 页。The following code example shows an ASP.NET page that manages inactive profiles. 控件显示返回的不活动配置文件。A control displays the inactive profiles returned. 控件的每一行 都包含一个按钮，该按钮通过调用方法从数据源中删除该行的配置文件 。Each row of the control includes a button that deletes the profile for that row from the data source with a call to the method. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider/CS/DeleteInactiveProfilescs.aspx#4)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider/VB/DeleteInactiveProfilesvb.aspx#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法从 `applicationName` 配置文件中属性指定的应用程序的数据源中删除指定配置文件的所有配置文件信息和属性。The method deletes all profile information and properties for the specified profiles from the data source for the application specified by the `applicationName` attribute in the configuration file. 使用作为参数传递的来指定要删除的配置文件的列表 `profiles` 。The list of profiles to delete is specified using a that is passed as the `profiles` parameter. 可以从 、 、 和 方法返回。A can be returned from the , , , and methods. 返回值可能与 提供的的值不同 。The return value may differ from the value for the supplied . 这表明在数据存储中找不到指定的中的某些配置文件 。This indicates that some of the profiles in the specified were no longer found in the data store. 在对方法的调用过程中执行的数据库更新在 事务中进行。The database updates that are performed during the call to the method are made within a transaction. 如果遇到错误，则回滚事务，并且不执行任何更新。If an error is encountered, the transaction is rolled back and no updates are performed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例允许用户使用和方法搜索配置文件 。The following code example allows a user to search for profiles using the and methods. 然后，用户可以通过调用方法删除返回的配置文件 。The user can then delete the returned profiles with a call to the method. summary.span: 检索一些配置文件的配置文件信息，在这些配置文件中，上次活动日期与指定的日期和时间相同或在其之前，而且配置文件的用户名与指定的名称匹配。

span.span: Retrieves profile information for profiles in which the last activity date occurred on or before the specified date and time and the user name for the profile matches the specified name.

returns.span: 包含不活动配置文件的用户配置文件信息的 ，这些不活动配置文件中的用户名与提供的 参数相匹配。

span.span: A containing user profile information for inactive profiles where the user name matches the supplied parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用于为配置文件中的属性指定的应用程序检索未使用的用户配置文件的配置文件信息 `applicationName` 。The method is used to retrieve profile information for unused user profiles for the application specified by the `applicationName` attribute in the configuration file. 此方法将仅检索配置文件的用户名与提供的参数值匹配的配置文件 `usernameToMatch` 。This method will only retrieve profiles for which the user name for the profile matches the supplied `usernameToMatch` parameter value. 使用 `authenticationOption` 参数来指定是只想要搜索匿名配置文件、仅限经过身份验证的配置文件还是要搜索的所有配置文件。Use the `authenticationOption` parameter to specify whether you want only anonymous profiles, only authenticated profiles, or all profiles to be searched. 在搜索的配置文件中，将 返回在指定参数值之前发生的任何配置文件 `userInactiveSinceDate` 。Of the searched profiles, any profile with a that occurs before the specified `userInactiveSinceDate` parameter value is returned. 使用关键字搜索参数值的匹配项， `usernameToMatch` `LIKE` 并支持通配符，如百分比 (% ) 符号。The searches for a match of the `usernameToMatch` parameter value using the `LIKE` keyword and supports wildcard characters, such as the percent (%) sign. 例如，如果将 `usernameToMatch` 参数设置为 "user1"，则会返回配置文件的用户名为 "user1" 的配置文件信息（如果存在）。For example, if the `usernameToMatch` parameter is set to "user1", then profile information for the profile with the user name of "user1" is returned, if it exists. 如果该 `usernameToMatch` 参数设置为 "user%"，则返回配置文件的配置文件信息，其中用户名为 "user1"、"用户 2"、"user_admin" 等。If the `usernameToMatch` parameter is set to "user%", then profile information for profiles with the user name of "user1", "user2", "user_admin", and so on are returned. 按用户的配置文件添加到数据存储的顺序返回用户。Users are returned in the order that their profiles were added to the data store. 返回的结果 是由 `pageIndex` 和参数约束的 `pageSize` 。The results returned by are constrained by the `pageIndex` and `pageSize` parameters. `pageSize`参数标识 要在中返回的对象的最大数目 。The `pageSize` parameter identifies the maximum number of objects to return in the . `pageIndex`参数标识要返回的结果页; 0 标识第一页。The `pageIndex` parameter identifies which page of results to return; 0 identifies the first page. `totalRecords`参数是一个 `out` 参数，该参数设置为 `applicationName` 基于 `authenticationOption` 和参数配置的非活动用户配置文件的总数 `userInactiveSinceDate` 。The `totalRecords` parameter is an `out` parameter that is set to the total number of inactive user profiles for the configured `applicationName`, based on the `authenticationOption` and `userInactiveSinceDate` parameters. 例如，如果配置了13个用户 `applicationName` ，并且 `pageIndex` 值为1且为 `pageSize` 5，则 返回的将包含第六个到第10个非活动配置文件。For example, if there are 13 users for the configured `applicationName`, and the `pageIndex` value is 1 with a `pageSize` of 5, the returned will contain the sixth through the tenth inactive profiles. `totalRecords`参数将设置为13。The `totalRecords` parameter will be set to 13. ## Examples 下面的代码示例允许用户提供 `usernameToMatch` 值和 并检索任何匹配配置文件的配置文件信息。The following code example allows a user to supply a `usernameToMatch` value and a and retrieves profile information for any matching profiles. 该示例还允许用户指定是否以独占方式返回非活动配置文件。The example also allows the user to specify whether to return inactive profiles exclusively. 如果用户仅指定不活动的配置文件，则 调用方法; 否则，将 调用方法。If the user specifies only inactive profiles, the method is called; otherwise, the method is called. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider/CS/FindProfilesByUserNamecs.aspx#5)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider/VB/FindProfilesByUserNamevb.aspx#5)]

summary.span: 检索用户名与指定名称匹配的配置文件的配置文件信息。

span.span: Retrieves profile information for profiles in which the user name matches the specified name.

returns.span: 包含配置文件中的用户配置文件信息的 ，其中的用户名与提供的 参数相匹配。

span.span: A containing user profile information for profiles where the user name matches the supplied parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回配置文件的用户名与为配置的提供的参数值匹配的配置文件信息的列表 `usernameToMatch` 。The method returns a list of profile information for which the user name for the profile matches the supplied `usernameToMatch` parameter value for the configured . 使用 `authenticationOption` 参数来指定是只想要搜索匿名配置文件、仅限经过身份验证的配置文件还是要搜索的所有配置文件。Use the `authenticationOption` parameter to specify whether you want only anonymous profiles, only authenticated profiles, or all profiles to be searched. 使用关键字搜索参数值的匹配项， `usernameToMatch` `LIKE` 并支持通配符，如百分比 (% ) 符号。The searches for a match of the `usernameToMatch` parameter value using the `LIKE` keyword and supports wildcard characters, such as the percent (%) sign. 例如，如果将 `usernameToMatch` 参数设置为 "user1"，则会返回配置文件的用户名为 "user1" 的配置文件信息（如果存在）。For example, if the `usernameToMatch` parameter is set to "user1", then profile information for the profile with the user name of "user1" is returned, if it exists. 如果该 `usernameToMatch` 参数设置为 "user%"，则返回配置文件的配置文件信息，其中用户名为 "user1"、"用户 2"、"user_admin" 等。If the `usernameToMatch` parameter is set to "user%", then profile information for profiles with the user name of "user1", "user2", "user_admin", and so on are returned. 按用户的配置文件添加到数据存储的顺序返回用户。Users are returned in the order that their profiles were added to the data store. 返回的结果 是由 `pageIndex` 和参数约束的 `pageSize` 。The results returned by are constrained by the `pageIndex` and `pageSize` parameters. `pageSize`参数标识 要在中返回的对象的最大数目 。The `pageSize` parameter identifies the maximum number of objects to return in the . `pageIndex`参数标识要返回的结果页; 0 标识第一页。The `pageIndex` parameter identifies which page of results to return; 0 identifies the first page. `totalRecords`参数是一个 `out` 参数，该参数设置为 `applicationName` 基于和参数由配置文件中的属性指定的应用程序的非活动用户配置文件总数 `authenticationOption` `userInactiveSinceDate` 。The `totalRecords` parameter is an `out` parameter that is set to the total number of inactive user profiles for the application specified by the `applicationName` attribute in the configuration file, based on the `authenticationOption` and `userInactiveSinceDate` parameters. 例如，如果配置了13个用户 `applicationName` ，并且 `pageIndex` 值为1且为 `pageSize` 5，则 返回的将包含第六个到第10个配置文件。For example, if there are 13 users for the configured `applicationName`, and the `pageIndex` value is 1 with a `pageSize` of 5, the returned will contain the sixth through the tenth profiles. `totalRecords`参数将设置为13。The `totalRecords` parameter will be set to 13. ## Examples 下面的代码示例允许用户提供 `usernameToMatch` 值和 并检索任何匹配配置文件的配置文件信息。The following code example allows a user to supply a `usernameToMatch` value and a and retrieves profile information for any matching profiles. 该示例还允许用户指定是否以独占方式返回非活动配置文件。The example also allows the user to specify whether to return inactive profiles exclusively. 如果用户仅指定不活动的配置文件，则 调用方法; 否则，将 调用方法。If the user specifies only inactive profiles, the method is called; otherwise, the method is called. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider/CS/FindProfilesByUserNamecs.aspx#5)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider/VB/FindProfilesByUserNamevb.aspx#5)]

span.span: A containing user profile information about the inactive profiles.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用于从数据源 `applicationName` 中为配置文件中的属性指定的应用程序的未使用用户配置文件检索配置文件信息。The method is used to retrieve profile information from the data source for unused user profiles for the application specified by the `applicationName` attribute in the configuration file. 使用 `authenticationOption` 参数来指定是只想要搜索匿名配置文件、仅限经过身份验证的配置文件还是要搜索的所有配置文件。Use the `authenticationOption` parameter to specify whether you want only anonymous profiles, only authenticated profiles, or all profiles to be searched. 在搜索的配置文件中，将 返回在指定参数值之前发生的任何配置文件 `userInactiveSinceDate` 。Of the searched profiles, any profile with a that occurs before the specified `userInactiveSinceDate` parameter value is returned. 返回的结果 是由 `pageIndex` 和参数约束的 `pageSize` 。The results returned by are constrained by the `pageIndex` and `pageSize` parameters. `pageSize`参数标识 要在中返回的对象的最大数目 。The `pageSize` parameter identifies the maximum number of objects to return in the . `pageIndex`参数标识要返回的结果页; 0 标识第一页。The `pageIndex` parameter identifies which page of results to return; 0 identifies the first page. `totalRecords`参数是一个 `out` 参数，该参数设置为 `applicationName` 基于 `authenticationOption` 和参数配置的非活动用户配置文件的总数 `userInactiveSinceDate` 。The `totalRecords` parameter is an `out` parameter that is set to the total number of inactive user profiles for the configured `applicationName`, based on the `authenticationOption` and `userInactiveSinceDate` parameters. 例如，如果配置了13个用户 `applicationName` ，并且 `pageIndex` 值为1且为 `pageSize` 5，则 返回的将包含第六个到第10个非活动配置文件。For example, if there are 13 users for the configured `applicationName`, and the `pageIndex` value is 1 with a `pageSize` of 5, the returned will contain the sixth through the tenth inactive profiles. `totalRecords`参数将设置为13。The `totalRecords` parameter will be set to 13. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了管理不活动配置文件的 ASP.NET 页。The following code example shows an ASP.NET page that manages inactive profiles. 提供了一个用于删除所有不活动配置文件的按钮。A button is provided to delete all inactive profiles. 配置文件是否被视为不活动取决于为参数指定的日期 `userInactiveSinceDate` 。Whether a profile is considered inactive is based on the date specified for the `userInactiveSinceDate` parameter. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider/CS/DeleteInactiveProfilescs.aspx#4)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider/VB/DeleteInactiveProfilesvb.aspx#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用于从 `applicationName` 配置文件中的属性指定的应用程序的数据源中检索配置文件的配置文件信息。The method is used to retrieve profile information for profiles from the data source for the application specified by the `applicationName` attribute in the configuration file. 使用 `authenticationOption` 参数来指定是只想要搜索匿名配置文件、仅限经过身份验证的配置文件还是要搜索的所有配置文件。Use the `authenticationOption` parameter to specify whether you want only anonymous profiles, only authenticated profiles, or all profiles to be searched. 返回的结果 是由 `pageIndex` 和参数约束的 `pageSize` 。The results returned by are constrained by the `pageIndex` and `pageSize` parameters. `pageSize`参数标识 要在中返回的对象的最大数目 。The `pageSize` parameter identifies the maximum number of objects to return in the . `pageIndex`参数标识要返回的结果页; 0 标识第一页。The `pageIndex` parameter identifies which page of results to return; 0 identifies the first page. `totalRecords`参数是一个 `out` 参数，该参数设置为 `applicationName` 基于 `authenticationOption` 和参数配置的非活动用户配置文件的总数 `userInactiveSinceDate` 。The `totalRecords` parameter is an `out` parameter that is set to the total number of inactive user profiles for the configured `applicationName`, based on the `authenticationOption` and `userInactiveSinceDate` parameters. 例如，如果配置了13个用户 `applicationName` ，并且 `pageIndex` 值为1且为 `pageSize` 5，则 返回的将包含第六个到第10个配置文件。For example, if there are 13 users for the configured `applicationName`, and the `pageIndex` value is 1 with a `pageSize` of 5, the returned will contain the sixth through the tenth profiles. `totalRecords`参数将设置为13。The `totalRecords` parameter will be set to 13. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示在数据页中配置的所有配置文件的配置文件信息 `applicationName` 。The following code example displays profile information for all of the profiles for the configured `applicationName` in pages of data. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider/CS/ShowProfilescs.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider/VB/ShowProfilesvb.aspx#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用于从配置文件中的属性指定的应用程序的数据源检索所有未使用的用户配置文件的计数 `applicationName` 。The method is used to retrieve a count of all of the unused user profiles from the data source for the application specified by the `applicationName` attribute in the configuration file. 使用 `authenticationOption` 参数来指定是只想要搜索匿名配置文件、仅限经过身份验证的配置文件还是要搜索的所有配置文件。Use the `authenticationOption` parameter to specify whether you want only anonymous profiles, only authenticated profiles, or all profiles to be searched. 在搜索配置文件中，将对所有配置文件（在 指定的参数值之前或之前）进行 `userInactiveSinceDate` 计数。Of the searched profiles, all profiles with a that occurs on or before the specified `userInactiveSinceDate` parameter value are counted. ## Examples 下面的代码示例允许用户根据搜索条件查看和删除活动和非活动配置文件信息。The following code example allows a user to view and delete active and inactive profiles information based on search criteria. 使用方法的结果显示非活动配置文件的计数 。A count of inactive profiles is displayed using the results of the method. param.span: 一个 ，包含要更新的属性的配置文件信息和值。

span.span: A containing profile information and values for the properties to be updated.

summary.span: 利用指定的属性值更新 SQL Server 配置文件数据库。

span.span: Updates the SQL Server profile database with the specified property values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当为当前请求设置属性值时，ASP.NET 配置文件服务使用方法更新 SQL Server 配置文件数据库。The method is used by ASP.NET profile services to update the SQL Server profile database when property values are set for the current request. 属性值是在配置文件中由属性指定的应用程序的数据源中设置的 `applicationName` 。Property values are set at the data source for the application specified by the `applicationName` attribute in the configuration file. 要更新的配置文件属性信息和值 指定为对象的集合 。Profile property information and values to be updated by the are specified as a collection of objects. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 方法修改配置文件属性值。The following code example uses the method to modify profile property values. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider/CS/setpropertyvaluescs.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider/VB/setpropertyvaluesvb.aspx#2)]

related.span: ASP.NET 配置文件属性概述

span.span: ASP.NET Profile Properties Overview
